item.title: 2018-2019 NBA Champion Toronto Raptors Analysis
item.description: Toronto Raptors won the 2018-2019 NBA Championship, which is really exciting. I watched the playoffs even months after the season was over. As a data analyst, I find datas of Raptors and did this analysis. Since tree methods could apperantly display the relations between the feature variables and the response variable. Figure 1: Kawhi Leonard vesus KD, who was injured during G5 library(readr) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) library(reshape2) library(magrittr) library(party) library(rpart) library(rpart.
